00024 class TokenizeConfig{

00026 public:

00028                 allows += astr;
00029         }

00037                 UString str(astr, UString::UTF_8);
00038                 allows += str;
00039         }

00059 class CharTypeTable{
00060         CharType charTypeTable[TWO_BYPE_MAX];
00061 public:
00062         static const CharType DEFAULT_ALLOW = 0x00; 
00063         static const CharType DEFAULT_DIVIDE = 0x01; 
00064         static const CharType DEFINED_ALLOW = 0x00; 
00065         static const CharType DEFINED_DIVIDE = 0x10; 
00066         static const CharType DEFINED_UNITE = 0x20; 
00067 
00068         CharTypeTable();
00069 
00072         void setConfig(const TokenizeConfig& conf);
00073 
00077         void setDefinedType(UCS2Char c, const CharType dtype){
00078                 CharType& type = charTypeTable[c];
00079                 type = type & 0x0F | dtype ;
00080         }
00081 
00085         void setDefaultType(UCS2Char c, const CharType dtype){
00086                 CharType& type = charTypeTable[c];
00087                 type = type & 0xF0 | dtype ;
00088         }
00089 
00093         CharType getDefinedType(UCS2Char c){
00094                 return charTypeTable[c] & 0xF0;
00095         }
00096 
00100         CharType getDefaultType(UCS2Char c){
00101                 return charTypeTable[c] & 0x0F;
00102         }
00103 
00107         bool isDefaultAllow(UCS2Char c){
00108                 return getDefaultType(c) == DEFAULT_ALLOW ;
00109         }
00110 
00114         bool isDefaultDivide(UCS2Char c){
00115                 return getDefaultType(c) == DEFAULT_DIVIDE ;
00116         }
00117 
00121         bool isDefinedAllow(UCS2Char c){
00122                 return getDefinedType(c) == DEFINED_ALLOW;
00123         }
00124 
00128         bool isDefinedDivide(UCS2Char c){
00129                 return getDefinedType(c) == DEFINED_DIVIDE;
00130         }
00131 
00135         bool isDefinedUnite(UCS2Char c){
00136                 return getDefinedType(c) == DEFINED_UNITE;
00137         }
00138 
00142         bool isDefaultEqual(UCS2Char c1, UCS2Char c2){
00143                 return getDefaultType(c1) == getDefaultType(c2);
00144         }
00145 
00149         bool isDefinedEqual(UCS2Char c1, UCS2Char c2){
00150                 return getDefinedType(c1) == getDefinedType(c2);
00151         }
00152 };
